Whether or not browser will auto focus on modal

comment.shortText: `onEscapeKeyDown` trigger function, when escape key is pressed while modal is active
`onOpen` trigger function, when modal is closed
`onOverlayClick` trigger function, when overlay is clicked
`onRendered` trigger function, when modal is closed

Backyard React Modal Controller
comment.text:
Extends from `ModalHandler` to offer and cleaner API to work with

Controls modal defined in `modal` prop with basic closing/opening handling

For more API controls integrated with this HOC, see `ModalHandler`

Example:
 <ModalController
     modal={(
         <Modal>
             <ModalHeader ... />
             <ModalBody ... />
             <ModalFooter ... />
         </Modal>
     )}
 />

comment.shortText: Backyard React Modal Handler
comment.text:
This component is used to extend the higher ordered component `ModalController`
Abstracts some of the complexity for future extending, if needed

Heavily influenced by Material UI's Modal Component

comment.shortText: `ModalControllerProvider` Backyard React
